creditline: Smithsonian Institution, National Museum of American History, Behring Center
description: .1 walnut stock engraved with cross-hatched pattern in two areas; almost all metalwork has engraved designs, including screw heads; gold, silver, silvered brass (?), brass and blued steel used on gun; silver engraved plate on either side of stock; right side of the plate has an eagle, flags and drums design, on left side is a sword, rifle and musical horn design; .2 ram rod
medium: American black walnut, steel, silver, gold
title: American Percussion  Sporting Rifle Made for Ulysses S. Grant
